posts.title: A collection of random thoughts
posts.author: Mohit Singh
posts.excerpt: This is a collection of random thoughts dumped in the form of a blog post. These thoughts are my personal views and opinions and are by no mean absolute.

posts.title: The Politics
posts.author: Mohit Singh
posts.excerpt: I remember a story by Hari Shankar Parsai, one of my favorite Hindi writers. The story was around election in jungle and sheep choosing wolves for their protection.

posts.title: Religions as I know
posts.author: Mohit Singh
posts.excerpt: We are curious creatures. We are never satisfied with what we perceive. We explore and experiment with things we don't understand.
